name: Don't Get Pet
description:
Overview

You are Coots, a cat. Ludwig, your owner, wants to pet you. You don't want to get pet by Ludwig. You want to avoid it by any means necessary.

This game as made for Ludwig's game jam 2023

Controls 

WASD - Movement

Q - Switch weapons

R - Open/Close Shop

I - Open/Close Instructions

Left Mouse Click - Fire

Right Mouse Click - Dash

Credits

victor_bx - programming/art

midtuna - music/sfx
